(What did he fire?  Is he still using his flamethrower?)

Necromancer conti=
nued to let his wings take the abuse, he rose his left wing up and blocked =
the shot. stress fractures continued to form as the abuse continued to take=
 its tole. as he blocked he swung his tale around at Mobsters head. 
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Saturday, January 06, 2001 3:39 PM
  Subject: Necromancer's fight with =
Mobster


  Mobster seen the ice blast coming, since this enemy has been fi=
ring them alot indeed. Mobster aimed Grenade's flamethrower, and managed to=
 destroy the ice ball with it. Then the fireballs came. Mobster tried to sw=
itch to Kracken's ice gun, but too late, bang! Mobster slaps at himself to =
put the fire out. It does in fact, though, start to defrost his arm. Was he=
 working on Gigas' brain? He must have been! He fired the flamethrower at h=
is arm and melted the ice. He took the gun back in his left arm. Horn Drill=
 had been known to be perfect at almost everything. Mobster aimed at Necrom=
ancer's head, and fired...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBE=
RWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2001 11=
:24 AM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Necromacer curled his wings i=
n front of him taking the brunt of Mobsters attack. small cracks began to f=
orm where the shots struck. He roared partly in intimidation and partly in =
disgust at the Alliance bot before him. he fired an ice blast from his mout=
h followed by a fireball out of each nostril.

        eGroups Sponsor 
   =
